{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3424668,"name":"Austin Eide","username":"GalacticDoughnuts","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/g/67e7ee/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-09-17T22:20:24.067Z","cooked":"

With the new type of radio introduced this year, does anyone know if they are required for off season events. Specifically we are attending the Kendrick Castillo Memorial Tournament in Colorado. Thanks.

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":5,"updated_at":"2024-09-17T22:20:24.067Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":9,"reads":251,"readers_count":250,"score":95.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":471380,"topic_slug":"for-other-teams-attending-kendrick-castillo-or-other-off-season-tournaments-is-the-new-type-of-radio-required","display_username":"Austin Eide","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":65058,"hidden":false,"trust_level":0,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/for-other-teams-attending-kendrick-castillo-or-other-off-season-tournaments-is-the-new-type-of-radio-required/471380/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3424673,"name":"EricH","username":"EricH","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/erich/{size}/128938_2.png","created_at":"2024-09-17T22:35:01.735Z","cooked":"

Generally speaking, the organizers have been announcing new/old radios in communications to their teams. You could, for your event, ask in Kcmt 2024 and see what response you get.

Use of new vs old is decided by individual events.

Yes, KCMT requires the new radios. If you have trouble paying for the radios, ask Debbie.

New radios confirmed on the KCMT page

ColoradoFIRST – 26 May 23

FIRST® Robotics Competition (KCMT)

Kendrick Castillo Memorial Tournament (KCMT). Mark your Calendar! Mark your calendar for October 14th & 15th (load in 13th).
